documents.document: “There are many trails up the mountain, but in time they all reach the top.” ~Anya Seton #quote
Beautiful early morning to you! Rise, shine and radiate :) <3
“People who keep dogs are cowards who haven’t got the guts to bite people themselves.” ~August Strindberg #quote ;)
@just1heather Today has been excellent, thank you for asking. I hope you’ve had a fantastic day as well! :)
Have a courageous Thursday, be an inspiration! “Courage is the art of being the only one who knows you’re scared to death.” ~Earl Wilson
@SpiritAli Thank you, Ali :)
@oOoOoBarracuda Yes, same policy every day! Beautiful :)
@MsJiiKay Excellent, I’m so happy for you! :)
Good morning, pretty peeps! :) <3
“When it becomes clear that no one else shares your level of passion, you are where you belong.” ~Placido Domingo #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Hey Ashley, I hope that’s true about your Wednesday as well! :)
“Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest.” ~Christian Dior #quote
Happy Tuesday, everyone! Today will be all smiles and sunshine. Right? Right! :)
@misschanto Aww, get well soon, Jenny :)
@Jenntrick Oh, thank you, dear :) *hugs*
@MariposaBonita_ Entirely my pleasure :)
@SUPERRROCKSTAR You are most welcome :)
“There are no winds that can blow it away on the air, when they try to blow it away, is when you know it will always be there” ~Melua #mm
“Some people think it’s far away, some know it’s with them every day, you are the reason we found ours, so thank you, stars” ~Melua #mm
“Some call it faith, some call it love, some call it guidance from above, you are the reason we found ours, so thank you, stars” ~Melua #mm
“… I don’t want my love to go to waste, I want you and your beautiful soul” ~Watts / Dodd / Jesse McCartney #MusicMonday
“I don’t want another pretty face, I don’t want just anyone to hold…” ~Watts / Dodd / Jesse McCartney #MusicMonday
Beautiful Monday, everyone! :) <3
“Stay the course, light a star, change the world where’er you are.” ~Richard Le Gallienne #quote
@PositivityDaily Why, thank you, Amber :)
@MsJiiKay Thank you Jii, I did! How was yours? :)
@Jenntrick You’ve earned it, Jenn :) How was your weekend? Mine was brilliant :)
@MariposaBonita_ Thank you, I did! Hope you did, too :)
I wish everyone a brilliant weekend! I shall see you soon. Stay beautiful <3 :)
Yes Jenn @Jenntrick you are there, and you cannot get off the list even if you try ;)
:) @just1heather :)
My #FollowFriday recommendation is my Friends list, awesome real people: http://twitter.com/Good_Quotes/friends :)
Big thanks for the #FF love to @Jean_ie and @Jenntrick <3 :)
“Don’t compromise yourself. You are all you’ve got.” ~Janis Joplin #quote
Hello @just1heather :) Today’s the perfect day for #5b5, are you in? :)
Let’s resolve to have an outstanding Friday! Are you with me? :)
Good morning @SUPERRROCKSTAR :)
@mxings I’m sure it applies to golfers as well ;)
Gooood morning, beauties :)
“A poet is someone who stands outside in the rain hoping to be struck by lightning.” ~James Dickey #quote
How’s your Thursday so far? Have your remembered to smile? :)
Thank you for your RT @SUPERRROCKSTAR :)
“Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.” ~Kahlil Gibran #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Entirely my pleasure, Ashley :) Get well soon!
“Anyone who trades liberty for security deserves neither liberty nor security.” ~Benjamin Franklin #quote
“Those who stand for nothing fall for anything.” ~Alexander Hamilton #quote
Ask me anything, and I might even answer ;) http://www.formspring.me/GoodQuotes
Well, if it isn’t Friday. How are you doing? :)
“Books are humanity in print.” ~Barbara Tuchman #quote
“It’s not who I am underneath, but what I do, that defines me.” ~Christian Bale #quote
Good morning, beauties. I wish for you a wonderful Wednesday :) <3
“Dreams that do come true can be as unsettling as those that don’t” ~Brett Butler #quote
“… but these miss you nights are the longest” ~D. Townsend #lyrics #MusicMonday
“… Thinking, of my going, how to cut the thread and leave it all behind, looking windward, for my compass, I take each day as it arrives…"
“… all my secrets, are a wasted affair, you know them well…” ~D. Townsend #lyrics #mm
“… How I missed you, I’m not likely to tell, I’m a man and cold day light buys the pride I'd rather sell…” ~D. Townsend #lyrics #mm
“… Summer warm winds, that embrace me, just as surely kissed your face, yet these miss you nights they're the longest…” ~D. Townsend #lyrics
“… Midnight diamonds, stud my heaven, southward burning like the jewels that eye your place…” ~D. Townsend #lyrics #mm
“… and children, saw me crying, I thought I’d had my share of that, but these miss-you-nights are the longest…” ~D. Townsend #lyrics #mm
“I’ve had many times, I can tell you, times when innocence I’d trade for company…” ~D. Townsend #lyrics #MusicMonday
“… And I can see this unraveling, your love is where I’m falling, but please don’t catch me” ~Lovato #lyrics #MusicMonday
“But you’re so hypnotizing, you’ve got me laughing while I sing, you’ve got me smiling in my sleep…” ~Lovato #lyrics #MusicMonday
“…Keep it sweet, keep it slow, let the future pass, and don’t let go, but tonight I could fall too soon under this beautiful moonlight…” #mm
“Before I fall, too fast, kiss me quick, but make it last, so I can see how badly this will hurt me, when you say good bye…” ~Lovato #mm
“Be the change you want to see in the world.” ~Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi #quote
I wish you all an awesome weekend! Stay beautiful as always :) <3
I’m aware of the fact that it’s Saturday, but please follow my dear friends at @Good_Quotes/friends :) #FF #FS
Hello beauties! Big thanks for the #FF love @delisateacher @rocketman528 @feistycoach @MariposaBonita_ @Jenntrick @crispyoinkie :) <3
“Wise men make proverbs but fools repeat them.” ~Samuel Palmer #quote
Let’s see how many RTs we can get for this next quote… ;)
“Am I obsessed with you, I do my best not to want you, but I do all the time, I do all the time…” ~Roger Lavoie/Miley Cyrus #lyrics #quote
“Maybe surrounded by, a million people I, still feel all alone, just wanna go home, oh I miss you, you know” ~Bublé #lyrics #MusicMonday
“…” ~Me #quote
“Just because nobody complains doesn’t mean all parachutes are perfect.” ~Benny Hill #quote
“I’m in a wonderful position: I’m unknown, I’m underrated, and there’s nowhere to go but up.” ~Pierre S. du Pont, IV #quote
“The opposite of war is not peace, it’s creation.” ~Jonathan Larson #quote
@CandancODonnell Thank you so much, that’s very sweet of you :) <3
“Never forget that the most powerful force on earth is love.” ~Nelson Rockefeller #quote
“To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.” ~Steve ‘Pre’ Prefontaine #quote
@Jenntrick Thank you, Jenn, you too! ;)
Happy Friday, everybody! Hope you’ve had a week of awesomeness :)
“Success is that old ABC—ability, breaks, and courage.” ~Charles Luckman #quote
“… and as I try to make my way, to the ordinary world, I will learn to survive” ~Duran Duran #lyrics #MusicMonday
“I won’t cry for yesterday, there’s an ordinary world, somehow I have to find…” ~Duran Duran #lyrics #MusicMonday
“If there were dreams to sell, what would you buy?” ~Thomas Lovell Beddoes #quote
“I can fall into a depression just to experience something new.” ~Nastassja Kinski #quote
“There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.” ~Edith Wharton #quote
“… As I watch the sun go down, watching the world fade away, all I want to do, is kiss you once goodbye” ~J. Somerville #lyrics #MusicMonday
“As I watch the sun go down, watching the world fade away, all the memories of you, come rushing back to me…” ~J. Somerville #lyrics #MM
“… Somewhere in my heart there is a will to set you free, all you’ve got to be, is true” ~Roddy Frame #lyrics #MusicMonday
“Somewhere in my heart there is a star that shines for you, silver splits the blue, love will see you through…” ~Roddy Frame #lyrics #MM
“Ambition and love wearing boxing gloves, and singing hearts and flowers…” ~Roddy Frame #lyrics #MusicMonday
“The more elaborate our means of communication, the less we communicate.” ~Joseph Priestley #quote
Are you in NYC on the 22nd or the 23rd? Want to grab a coffee? :)
“The world is a beautiful book, but of little use to him who cannot read it.” ~Carlo Goldoni #quote
“If a friend is in trouble, don’t annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do—think up something appropriate and do it.” ~E. W. Howe
“Our most difficult task as a friend is to offer understanding when we don’t understand.” ~Robert Brault #quote #tomyfriend <3
“A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.” ~Arnold Glasow #quote #tomyfriend <3
“The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.” ~Walter Bagehot #quote
Have an awesome Friday! Smile :) <3
